list.title: Download the latest version of the plug-in (version 1.3). Click here to download: optimalship.zip
Open your Wordpress Admin panel, click on Plugins, and select Add New.
Click Upload Plugin and select the downloaded ZIP.
Find Optimal Ship Express International Shipping in your list of plugins and click Activate (if necessary).
On the side panel, click on Woocommerce and select Settings.
Click Optimal Ship in the Shipping panel sub-menu.

content.title: This will pull up the configuration menu as seen below.
unorderedList: Export Number: Enter OptimalShip Export Number. If you do not know your Export Number, please contact customerservice@optimalship.com
Enable: Click the Enable checkbox to begin showing DHL Express with OptimalShip rates in your shopping cart. To remove this shipping service without uninstalling the plugin, uncheck this box.
Enable Dimensional Weights: If your products have dimensions, click Enable Dimensions Weights. This will allow dimensional weights to be used, resulting in much more accurate rates on larger items.
Custom Surcharge: Add a Custom Surcharge as desired. This is a flat rate that will be added to the total charge of the shipment and passed on to the client in their shopping cart.
Title: Adjust title as desired. This is the name of the OptimalShip shipping option as it will appear in your customer's shopping cart.

list.title: If you want to enable this shipping option internationally, click on the Shipping Zones tab in the Shipping panel sub-menu and add DHL with OptimalShip to international shipping zones.

Verify everything is working by adding items to your shopping cart and calculating the shipping cost. You should see DHL with OptimalShip (or the Title you provided in the configuration menu) appear as one of the shipping options for international orders.
